sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT Email, FirstName, LastName, Username, Alias, TimeZoneSidKey, LocaleSidKey, EmailEncodingKey, ProfileId, LanguageLocaleKey, LastModifiedDate FROM User WHERE IsActive = true AND LastModifiedDate > ${startingDate}
sfdc:query.doc:name: query Users from Salesforce instance A

batch:step.name: getUserInBStep

sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate FROM User WHERE Email = '#[payload['Email']]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: query user in Salesforce instance B

batch:step.expression-component: // ID from source system should be removed, as SalesForce will assign it automatically payload.remove('Id');

expression-component.doc:name: define Id in SalesForce Intance B

when.expression-component: // Put ID from the object in B so that SalesForce updates this object payload.put('Id', recordVars['userInB']['Id']);

set-payload.doc:name: set to null to skip this user

batch:step.name: createUsersInBStep

expression-component.doc:name: assign ProfileId and Username to the User
